resources.string: Tap this when you activate the crystal to trigger the enrage countdown. The glass breaks at 10:00 remaining.
Tap this when the first person moves out of the left or right door to start the Crota movement countdown.
If you wipe, use this to reset all timers and start again. May or may not give extra heavy ammo drops.

Wondering when Crota is going to move? Is he going left or right next? What are next weeks lottery numbers? If you\'re curious about the answers to these questions and more, Destiny Raid Timers is here to help.
This app is free and open-source. Contributions are welcome.
Keep track of the countdown on your glimmer consumables and weapon telemetries.
